title: Food Theory: The Conspiracy that ENDED Kentucky Fried Chicken (KFC)
author: The Food Theorists
description:
Special thanks to Trade Coffee for sponsoring this episode!
Use Food Theory's exclusive link: https://cen.yt/TradeFoodTheorists to get your first bag from Trade Coffee for free.

Holiday Theory Wear is Here! ►► https://creatorink.co/l6s

Do you remember when KFC used to stand for Kentucky Fried Chicken? Maybe you didn't know that they officially changed their name! Loyal Theorists, we've already solved one of KFC's biggest mysteries - the secret recipe. Now, we are tackling the mystery of the big name change and what made them do it!
  
SUBSCRIBE for Every Theory! ►► https://bit.ly/2CdCooV
